Foxfingers heard fire from outside. he watched the watcher (Drillbit) with
sly eyes. When Drillbit finally left Foxfingers stood up to explore the
room. he checked out the tube the clone was created in. There was a slimy
ooze on the floor. He scooped it up and smelled it. It was DNA residue. Kit
Kat was already involved in some sort of cloning experiments. He placed a
sample in a specimen tube and added it to his collection.(Not to bright for
Drillbit to lock a thief in a science lab.)

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

Subject: ship under attack


> ::DrillBit::
>
> He heard heavy gun fire. He pressed a button on a panel, opening a link
> to the ships main areas.
> "This is DrillBit. what on Cybertron is going on?!" He kwpt his eyes on
> Foxfingers.
>
>
